amendment.description: To prevent the closure and defunding of certain women's business centers.

vote.text: Amendment SA 112 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 112 proposed by Senator Sununu to Amendment SA 100. (consideration: CR S881-882; text: CR S881) To prevent the closure and defunding of certain women's business centers.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 112 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 112 proposed by Senator Sununu to Amendment SA 100.
